page.title: 01 _____ INTRODUCTION _____
page.content: The area we cover contains the villages of {Limpsfield Common, {Limpsfield Chart,Holland}and part of {Hurst Green.}Our area is being surveyed by two schools. The land that surrounds us was once a mainly rural area.Now there are several housing estates and more are imminent,but it is still a beautiful area,many commuters live here and there are few people that work in the area.{ { Limpsfield Common}is a wooded area protected by the{National Trust}. {Limpsfield Chart}is a housing estate village.{Holland}and{Hurst Green}are two villages merged together.They are mainly housing estates;there are shops in both villages and a station in{Hurst Green}.Nearby is the{M25} motorway and the town of{Oxted}.
